mapper.insert: insert member(member_firstname, member_address, member_birthday, member_email, member_pwd, member_phoneNumber) value (#{member.memberFirstname}, #{member.memberAddress}, #{member.memberBirthday}, #{member.memberEmail}, #{member.memberPwd}, #{member.memberPhoneNumber})
mapper.select: select * from member where member_email = #{member.memberEmail} and member_pwd = #{member.memberPwd}
mapper.update: update member set member_firstname = #{member.memberFirstname}, member_pwd = #{member.memberPwd}, member_phoneNumber = #{member.memberPhoneNumber}, member_email = #{member.memberEmail}, member_address = #{member.memberAddress} where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_email = #{email} and member_pwd = #{password}
mapper.select: select count(member_email) from member where member_email = #{email}
